sn22.29:4.2: “Mendicants, if you enjoy form, you enjoy suffering.
sn22.29:4.3: If you enjoy suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.
sn22.29:4.8: If you enjoy suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.
sn22.29:4.9: If you don’t enjoy form, you don’t enjoy suffering.
sn22.29:4.10: If you don’t enjoy suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.
sn22.29:4.15: If you don’t enjoy suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.”
